item.description:
It is pretty simple really, I am basically a lazy person and I want you to trim my Xmas tree for me. The nature of the 'It's Time for a Party' costume and scavenger hunt theme precludes decorating on that evening. The space and body count limits of the gingerbread event precludes decorating the tree. The only reasonable conclusion is that I should have another party just to decorate the tree.

The theme for our monthly cooking club is "anything goes". Cook at home or cook here, make whatever you want, wear whatever you want, and bring whomever you want. All I ask is that you help me put my ornaments and do-dads on my tree and that you have a good time.

We'll start a bit earlier than usual so that if you have other parties or events you can attend both.

The holidays are more magical with you so please attend!
item.how_to_find_us: I will send the address a few days before the event
item.name: Anything Goes - tree trimming party
